desc: This transformation will find some num words in sentences and replace them with different num word.

ori.premise: 3 young man in hoods standing in the middle of a quiet street facing the camera.
ori.hypothesis: Three hood wearing people pose for a picture.
ori.label: entailment

trans.premise: 2 young man in hoods standing in the middle of a quiet street facing the camera.
trans.hypothesis: 3 young man in hoods standing in the middle of a quiet street facing the camera.
trans.label: contradiction

ori.premise: A crowd of people looking up at 3 people on the edge of the roof of a building.
ori.hypothesis: The crowd is calling for help for the people on the roof.
ori.label: neutral

trans.premise: A crowd of people looking up at more than 3 people on the edge of the roof of a building.
trans.hypothesis: A crowd of people looking up at 3 people on the edge of the roof of a building.
trans.label: contradiction
